properties.body:
WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 01.
183 METER M/V ZILOS, ON FIRE IN 34-27S 040-48W ON
01 SEP. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A
SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO NAVAREA VI,
INMARSAT-C: 470100125,
PHONE: 5429 3248 7150, 5411 4301 2249, 5429 3248
7162, 5411 4301 0061, 5411 4301  0067, EXT 4028,
FAX: 5411 4301 2249,
E-MAIL: snautica@hidro.gov.ar,
shn_orgint@hidro.gov.ar.
